text:
Bug 33939 solved the issue to retain the file timestamps when downloading file via ant scp task.
I added the handling for retaining file timestamp during upload.

Example ant-task:

<target name="release-to-scp" description="Copy file via scp to server">		
    <scp todir="user@ip:/home/user/dir" password="${scp_pwd}" verbose="true" preservelastmodified="true">
	<fileset dir="${deploy.dir}/lib">
		<include name="file1"/>
		<include name="file2"/>
	</fileset>
    </scp>		
</target>

Created attachment 33260
Scp task containing preservelastmodified for upload
